title: sukhamAna nilai
sahitya:
sukhamAna nilai vENDin ahambhAvattai viTTu shuddha Om ivAi manamE


anupallavi

  sakala guNa kalyANan sarvAntaryAmi avan sharaNinrip-parama upashAnta nilai kUDumO


caraNam    karaiyaTra dAhamuDan kaNNIrum kambalaiyum uraiyaTru vIN vAda
paraiyaTru jagamAyap-puraiyaTru para bhakti niraivuTra varaiyaTra
